lyrics:
16 contributorscolors lyricsverse 1 ed sloan mitch james
can you feel it crush you does it seem to bring the worst in you out
theres no runnin away from these things that hold you down
do they complicate you because they make you feel like this
of all the colors that youve shined this is surely not your best
but you should know these colors that youre shinin are

chorus ed sloan  mitch james
surely not the best colors that you shine
surely not the best colors that you shine

verse 2 ed sloan mitch james
i know you feel alone yeah and no one else can figure you out
but dont you ever turn away from the ones that help you down
well theyd love to save you dont you know they love to see you smile
but these colors that youve shined are surely not your style
but you should know these colors that youre shinin are

chorus ed sloan  mitch james
surely not the best colors that you shine
surely not the best colors that you shine

bridge mitch james
i know youre feelin like youre lost
but you should know these colors that youre shining are
i know youre feeling like youre lost
you feel youve drifted way too far
did you know these colors that youre shinin are
you might also likechorus ed sloan  mitch james

surely not the best colors that you shine

colors that you shine
